title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit                   Stop in at the Alibates Visitor Center               Alibates Flint               Watch a Flintknapping Demonstration               Hike with a Ranger Up to the Quarries         Â    Alibates Flint Quarries offers a unique look into the history and culture of the southern High Plains. Hike up to the quarries with a ranger and learn about this special type of flint. Watch a knapping demonstration and learn how ancient tools were made.   Throughout the year, many types of programs and demonstrations are offered for visitors of all ages.
